thread.title: Mike Francesa screams 'WIN THE GAME!' at caller who thinks Pirates got robbed (AUDIO)
thread.title_full: Mike Francesa screams 'WIN THE GAME!' at caller who thinks Pirates got robbed (AUDIO)

author: Charles Curtis | For NJ Advance Media
title: Mike Francesa screams 'WIN THE GAME!' at caller who thinks Pirates got robbed (AUDIO)
text:
PLUS: Francesa fan fest FrancesaCon has 2016 date set for January 
The audio you hear above starts with a caller who thinks the Pittsburgh Pirates were robbed because they lost the one-game Wild Card playoff to the Chicago Cubs and deserved a shot to play in something longer like a three-game series. 
Francesa's response? 
"Are the Cubs unhappy with what happened [Wednesday night]?" he asked. "You know what? Win the game! WIN THE GAME! WIN THE GAME! ... You didn't win your division." 
Follow Charles Curtis on Twitter @charlescurtis82 . Find NJ.com on Facebook .
